attributes.additional_details: Sleep is crucial for a persons health . Children and Teenagers should have the right to having at least 8 hours of sleep and lots of homework makes the not possible in some cases . The goverment and parliment should make going to school at 10 possible to help under 18s learn better
attributes.background: To make all school start at 10 because students struggle waking up because of the pressure with homework and getting more sleep with help childrens learning and brain function.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612113
